name: pending
caption: Comandos Pendientes @unit_idx
query: SELECT pending.id,pending.unit_id, c.command as name, pending.command, CASE pending.type WHEN 1 THEN 'SET' ELSE 'GET' END as type, pending.datetime, (TIMEDIFF(now(), datetime)) as delay FROM pending INNER JOIN devices_commands as c ON c.id = pending.command_id WHERE pending.unit_id='@unit_idx'

infoFields.name: brand_id
infoFields.caption: Marca
data: select id, brand from brands ORDER BY brand
